key_risks: Cybersecurity vulnerabilities, including ransomware incidents and man-in-the-middle attacks
Regulatory and compliance risks due to evolving financial regulations and data privacy laws
Dependence on legacy systems hindering adoption of new solutions
Intense market competition in the FinTech sector
Spin-off and valuation concerns, including potential undervaluation and buyout risks
controversies: Ransomware incident impacting legal, reputational, and financial stability
Activist investor Engaged Capital arguing the company is undervalued
environmental_issues: Launch of sustainability initiatives, such as eco-friendly ATM models
social_issues: Commitment to data protection and ethical standards through Privacy Policy and Code of Conduct
governance_issues: Robust corporate governance guidelines and focus on compliance
